item.title: Workspace
item.description: Workspace is an Interior design agency that focuses on creating working environments. Bond created Workspace's new visual identity including the logo, typography, colours and the website.
item.content:encoded: Workspace is an Interior design agency that focuses on creating working environments. Bond created Workspace's new visual identity including the logo, typography, colours and the website.

item.title: SUBSTANCE
item.description: SUBSTANCE "In terms of sentiments, the lack of logic is the best evidence of sincerity" Tolstoï The SUBSTANCE is a synthetic body composed of a single material (of which the composition is unknown) and a random physical reality. We are not equipped with enough information about its manufacturing process and polymerization in order to understand its origins; its seems to us, however, that it is a new state of matter (solid, liquid, gas, or plasma), one of a kind of sensitivity. The SUBSTANCE can be found in several stages by a single contradictory factor, the Human Being. Its evolution is based on any quantifiable or predictable criteria; it may cause the accident as much as it can avoid it. Its phases of transition are instantaneous, and it reacts to any environmental factor. Its instability does not permit a safe utility, nor does it allow a controlled and deliberate manipulation. The SUBSTANCE has no recordable property.
item.content:encoded: SUBSTANCE "In terms of sentiments, the lack of logic is the best evidence of sincerity" Tolstoï The SUBSTANCE is a synthetic body composed of a single material (of which the composition is unknown) and a random physical reality. We are not equipped with enough information about its manufacturing process and polymerization in order to understand its origins; its seems to us, however, that it is a new state of matter (solid, liquid, gas, or plasma), one of a kind of sensitivity. The SUBSTANCE can be found in several stages by a single contradictory factor, the Human Being. Its evolution is based on any quantifiable or predictable criteria; it may cause the accident as much as it can avoid it. Its phases of transition are instantaneous, and it reacts to any environmental factor. Its instability does not permit a safe utility, nor does it allow a controlled and deliberate manipulation. The SUBSTANCE has no recordable property.

item.title: Scotland Monkeys
item.description: We displayed the maxim "Everybody always thinks they are right" in the Scottish cities of Glasgow, Aberdeen, Edinburgh, Inverness, Dundee, and Stirling. Commissioned by the Scottish government initiated Six Cities Design Festival, a total of six 33-foot (10-meter) white and angry monkeys were placed, in various positions, on eminent locations smack in the center of each of these cities. Illustrated by Monika Aichele in Germany and built by Sportogo in California, each monkey held a banner containing one word of the sentence, the whole sentiment only completed for a viewer visiting all cities, or through the media.
item.content:encoded: We displayed the maxim "Everybody always thinks they are right" in the Scottish cities of Glasgow, Aberdeen, Edinburgh, Inverness, Dundee, and Stirling. Commissioned by the Scottish government initiated Six Cities Design Festival, a total of six 33-foot (10-meter) white and angry monkeys were placed, in various positions, on eminent locations smack in the center of each of these cities. Illustrated by Monika Aichele in Germany and built by Sportogo in California, each monkey held a banner containing one word of the sentence, the whole sentiment only completed for a viewer visiting all cities, or through the media.

item.title: The Bricks - UI Framework
item.description: The Bricks is a Free set of User Interface components designed to facilitate the creation of design or prototype for the future website. This package will help you save your time in the process of development of components, and will become an excellent basis for creating website from design to code. Dont waste your time drawing numerous shapes, when they are already included in this package. Just drag the component, change its style and use it. It is simple, fast and beautiful.
item.content:encoded: The Bricks is a Free set of User Interface components designed to facilitate the creation of design or prototype for the future website. This package will help you save your time in the process of development of components, and will become an excellent basis for creating website from design to code. Dont waste your time drawing numerous shapes, when they are already included in this package. Just drag the component, change its style and use it. It is simple, fast and beautiful.

item.title: LING MAGAZINE ISSUE 12 ILLUSTRATION
item.description: Ling Magazine's type illustration. THE CITY THAT LIGHTS UP WITH ITS RESIDENTS FOOTSTEPS Toulouse, known as the pink city because of the colour of its buildings at sunset, will now shine even brighter thanks to its residents footsteps: the energy they produce by strolling around their city will power the street lamps along the way. And all thanks to technology which first came to light on a nightclub dance floor.
item.content:encoded: Ling Magazine's type illustration. THE CITY THAT LIGHTS UP WITH ITS RESIDENTS FOOTSTEPS Toulouse, known as the pink city because of the colour of its buildings at sunset, will now shine even brighter thanks to its residents footsteps: the energy they produce by strolling around their city will power the street lamps along the way. And all thanks to technology which first came to light on a nightclub dance floor.

item.title: IPG Media Economy Report
item.description: Editorial- and Information-Design for the first Media Economy Report for IPG Mediabrands and their strategic global media unit MagnaGlobal. Informed by the global resources of IPG MEDIABRANDS, this inaugural Media Economy Report contains an overview of the forces influencing value in the media marketplace, Q&As with three industry leaders, and Magnas point of view on how advertising stakeholders in the media value chainmedia owners, agencies, and advertiserscan leverage market disruptions to achieve the greatest possible value.
item.content:encoded: Editorial- and Information-Design for the first Media Economy Report for IPG Mediabrands and their strategic global media unit MagnaGlobal. Informed by the global resources of IPG MEDIABRANDS, this inaugural Media Economy Report contains an overview of the forces influencing value in the media marketplace, Q&As with three industry leaders, and Magnas point of view on how advertising stakeholders in the media value chainmedia owners, agencies, and advertiserscan leverage market disruptions to achieve the greatest possible value.

item.title: BP Portrait Awards
item.description: We created a fresh and modern new identity to give the competition increased presence and to move away from its perception as an amateurish and unappreciated show. The identity is applied to all marketing materials and advertising, exhibition environment and front of house. It is still the identity at the present time. In addition to creating the new identity the NPG asked us to art direct and design a book showcasing the past winners and the best paintings from the entire life of the awards.
item.content:encoded: We created a fresh and modern new identity to give the competition increased presence and to move away from its perception as an amateurish and unappreciated show. The identity is applied to all marketing materials and advertising, exhibition environment and front of house. It is still the identity at the present time. In addition to creating the new identity the NPG asked us to art direct and design a book showcasing the past winners and the best paintings from the entire life of the awards.

item.title: Celebrate Legendary
item.description: On July 16, 2012, Roger Federer surpassed Pete Sampras record for most weeks as the top-ranked tennis player in the world. With his 287th week as the worlds No. 1, the Swiss maestro further cemented his status as the greatest of all time. To commemorate the occasion, I worked with the Nike Tennis team on a limited-edition series of Rogers signature Zoom Vapor 9 Tour shoe, limited to 287 pairs (one for each week on top of the rankings). I created a custom ambigram logo, pattern and special packaging inspired by the back of playing cards to honor the achievement. Inside the box is a signed note from Roger, which reads: This limited edition pair of Nike Zoom Vapor RF287 celebrates a milestone that represents so much to me for a multitude of reasons. Knowing all that comes with holding the #1 position in Mens Tennis for the first time, the longest time, the most times with respect and honor, I continue. Roger Federer July 16, 2012
item.content:encoded: On July 16, 2012, Roger Federer surpassed Pete Sampras record for most weeks as the top-ranked tennis player in the world. With his 287th week as the worlds No. 1, the Swiss maestro further cemented his status as the greatest of all time. To commemorate the occasion, I worked with the Nike Tennis team on a limited-edition series of Rogers signature Zoom Vapor 9 Tour shoe, limited to 287 pairs (one for each week on top of the rankings). I created a custom ambigram logo, pattern and special packaging inspired by the back of playing cards to honor the achievement. Inside the box is a signed note from Roger, which reads: This limited edition pair of Nike Zoom Vapor RF287 celebrates a milestone that represents so much to me for a multitude of reasons. Knowing all that comes with holding the #1 position in Mens Tennis for the first time, the longest time, the most times with respect and honor, I continue. Roger Federer July 16, 2012

item.title: War Game
item.description: In newspaper, television, film, the representaton of War is everywhere in our media ; never in our everyday life, but brought back from farthest regions of the world. I decided to put it back in our reality. I imagined an iconic representation of military vehicules, & chose to use an area of Paris known as La Defense, a natural location for such a combat. With the long passage of time, the armorment reclines into the scenery I imagined an i c o n i c r e p r e s e n t a t i o n o f m i l i t a r y v e h i c u l e s , & chose to use a n a r e a of Paris known as L a D e f e n s e , a natural location for such a combat. With the long passage of time, the armorment reclines into the scenery

item.title: Where Cold is Cool
item.description: To invite people from Europe, discover real Russia and fly here with S7, we created an interactive print ad and printed some parts of illustration with the invisible thermochromic ink. Yes, we do know all these stereotypes. But things are not what they seem to be. When you put the ad in the freezer for a short while, the ink appears and gives a whole new meaning to the initial picture.
item.content:encoded: To invite people from Europe, discover real Russia and fly here with S7, we created an interactive print ad and printed some parts of illustration with the invisible thermochromic ink. Yes, we do know all these stereotypes. But things are not what they seem to be. When you put the ad in the freezer for a short while, the ink appears and gives a whole new meaning to the initial picture.

item.title: Signika
item.description: Signika is a sans-serif with a gentle character, developed for wayfinding, signage, and other media where clarity of information is required. It has a low contrast and tall x-height to improve readability of texts in small sizes as well as in large distances from the reader. Being a typical signage typeface it is inspired by typefaces such as Ronnia, Meta, and Tahoma. The typeface comes with a wide character set supporting Western European languages, Polish, and Czech. The figures are designed as tabular.
item.content:encoded: Signika is a sans-serif with a gentle character, developed for wayfinding, signage, and other media where clarity of information is required. It has a low contrast and tall x-height to improve readability of texts in small sizes as well as in large distances from the reader. Being a typical signage typeface it is inspired by typefaces such as Ronnia, Meta, and Tahoma. The typeface comes with a wide character set supporting Western European languages, Polish, and Czech. The figures are designed as tabular.

item.title: NCB Naturalis
item.description: In 2010 three institutes combined their collections forming NCB Naturalis, the Dutch centre of excellence for biodiversity studies. Herewith becoming one of the largest collections in the world, with over 37 million objects. We were asked to create a film in which the past, present and future of the organisation is visualised.
item.content:encoded: In 2010 three institutes combined their collections forming NCB Naturalis, the Dutch centre of excellence for biodiversity studies. Herewith becoming one of the largest collections in the world, with over 37 million objects. We were asked to create a film in which the past, present and future of the organisation is visualised.

item.title: ACCENTS DECORATION
item.description: Accents Decoration. We had two girls, one business and a whirlwind of creative ideas ready to be shared. They wanted to boost the look of their boutique and we were definitely up for the challenge. In this project, our main goal was to highlight the meaning of an accent and its importance in different settings to create a unique space. With that in mind, we decided to give a face-lift to their image for their sixth anniversary to mark the beginning of this new phase. The ultimate makeover included a new logo, website, shopping bags, tags, stationary and presentation materials which are the undeniable portrait of absolute style. Copyright. La Tortillería.
item.content:encoded: Accents Decoration. We had two girls, one business and a whirlwind of creative ideas ready to be shared. They wanted to boost the look of their boutique and we were definitely up for the challenge. In this project, our main goal was to highlight the meaning of an accent and its importance in different settings to create a unique space. With that in mind, we decided to give a face-lift to their image for their sixth anniversary to mark the beginning of this new phase. The ultimate makeover included a new logo, website, shopping bags, tags, stationary and presentation materials which are the undeniable portrait of absolute style. Copyright. La Tortillería.

item.title: Crepundia Felis Monogrammus
item.description: This piece was created for the Jinxed Philadelphia Munnyworld show. The inital platform was a Trikky. Rather than add to or subtract from the platform the base piece was used as inspiration and defined the limiting parameters for the work. The skeletal construction was designed and built to fit within the given frame of the Trikky platform. The piece was constructed using various techniques starting with an 360 degree image capture of the raw platform. Then a 3d model was constructed to those shapes and proportions. The next step was to 3d print the parts many of which were further carved and sculpted by hand. The individual parts were painted with monsterkolor paints and a patina was added with a few layers of brown and black shoe polish. The framework for this piece is soldered brass, it took two days to construct, mount and securely fasten all the pieces in place. The piece is housed in a glass bell jar with a hand turned base and custom dedication plaque.
item.content:encoded: This piece was created for the Jinxed Philadelphia Munnyworld show. The inital platform was a Trikky. Rather than add to or subtract from the platform the base piece was used as inspiration and defined the limiting parameters for the work. The skeletal construction was designed and built to fit within the given frame of the Trikky platform. The piece was constructed using various techniques starting with an 360 degree image capture of the raw platform. Then a 3d model was constructed to those shapes and proportions. The next step was to 3d print the parts many of which were further carved and sculpted by hand. The individual parts were painted with monsterkolor paints and a patina was added with a few layers of brown and black shoe polish. The framework for this piece is soldered brass, it took two days to construct, mount and securely fasten all the pieces in place. The piece is housed in a glass bell jar with a hand turned base and custom dedication plaque.
